name: SCOR - About
description: Overview entries to explain the SCOR namespace inside MISP.

values.description: SCOR stands for Space, Cybersecurity, Operations, and Resilience. It is the shared namespace used to publish space security galaxies and clusters such as METEORSTORM, SPARTA, and SPACE-SHIELD elements.

PCE - Terrestrial, Aerial, Orbital, Deep Space. SEG - Ground, User, Launch, Space, Deep Space. SVC - Control, Data, Hybrid. AST - Hardware, Firmware, Software, Data, Signal, Hybrid. AN - IOC, IOA, Threat, Detection, Resilience.
Propose changes via the SCOR repository. Keep UUIDs stable. Bump version when IDs or descriptions change.

meta.policy: UUIDs immutable - version bump on content change
